name: Finn the Flappy Fish - A Brave Fish's Saga
name_original: Finn the Flappy Fish - A Brave Fish's Saga
description:
Our fish friend Finn has escaped the confines of the water with a jetpack! Help him explore the on-ground world by avoiding the birds and crabs out to send him back to the depths of the ocean!

Simply tap and hold to fly higher and let go to fly lower!

Features you will enjoy with this easy to play, fun, addicting game:
*Collect Coins!
*Avoid the Crazy Crabs!
*Avoid the Ballistic Bluejays!
*Enjoy the ambience created by the music and background noises!
*Best of all, it's FREE!
